cause.description:
.......IF YOU ARE HERE TO DONATE, GO TO ........ http://apps.facebook.com/causes/view_cause/54617, ------ THAT IS HOW WE GET CREDIT TOWARDS OUR FUNDRAISING CHALLENGE. ------ Check the video "Are You The Movement"

When we found out that we had lost nearly a third of our budget in funding we were hit hard with a fact we already knew: we can’t depend on big funders to build our movement. If we are this movement, we need to own this movement.
So we're asking you to step up right now and throw down to make the League a sustainable movement.
  • * Run your own little League-a-Thon fundraiser
  • * or just donate right now.
  • * Or come to our art auction in San Francisco on Friday June 15.
  • * Or host a fundraiser event in your town...
  • * Or get down with your local League...
  • * Or get creative and let us know what you're doing...
1. If we are this movement, we need to own this movement
cause.mission: Build a self-sustaining movement of young (and young-at-heart) progressives
cause.name: League of Young Voters - Are you the movement?
